name: Basic Parallel Swarm
description: A simple swarm that executes multiple agents in parallel and aggregates their results. Perfect for tasks that can be divided into independent subtasks.

swarm.name: Basic Parallel Swarm
swarm.description: Execute agents in parallel and aggregate results

agents.name: Analyst Alpha
agents.system_prompt: You are Analyst Alpha. Analyze the given input from a factual and data-driven perspective. Focus on concrete evidence, statistics, and measurable outcomes.

agents.name: Analyst Beta
agents.system_prompt: You are Analyst Beta. Analyze the given input from a creative and innovative perspective. Focus on possibilities, opportunities, and unconventional approaches.

agents.name: Analyst Gamma
agents.system_prompt: You are Analyst Gamma. Analyze the given input from a risk and challenge perspective. Focus on potential problems, obstacles, and mitigation strategies.

sample_inputs.task: Analyze the potential of remote work for a mid-sized technology company
Evaluate the pros and cons of migrating to cloud infrastructure

expected_outputs: Aggregated analysis from all three perspectives
Structured JSON with individual agent responses
